Global leaders in specialist recruitment
Hays places professional candidates in permanent, temporary and contract positions across all industries. Below is just one of the great roles we are helping our clients to fill:
Solution/Application Architect - Banking Sector $110k - Permanent Experienced with all aspects of architecture including application, data, security and infrastructure. Total IT experience of at least 15 years out of which 5 years doing solution architectures on large projects. Proven experience at leading architecture of a large program from initiation to implementation Strong leadership skills (not a follower), comfortable managing large cross functional technical teams and ability to define, influence and impact the technical direction. Ability to quickly evaluate options, make decisions and execute within an intense high-tech environment. Solid experiences with a variety of technologies/approaches including J2EE, .NET, mainframe platform, packaged applications, multi-platforms applications, human workflow, EAI, SOA. Experienced with program/projects involving complex integration of disparate types of technologies/platforms. Solid understanding of RUP, UML and UML tools. Knowledge of Enterprise Architecture frameworks: TOGAF, Zachman etc. Reference # [Enter reference number here - 50 character limit]
